summary: Loads and prepares 3‑dimensional BIDS‑formatted MRI data for deep‑learning pipelines, managing subject files, target masks, slice orientation, caching, preprocessing and training transforms, optional ROI cropping, multichannel contrast handling, FiLM metadata selection, object‑detection settings, and simulated missing modalities.
business_intent: Enable efficient and flexible feeding of 3D medical imaging data into neural networks for training and inference, supporting various preprocessing, augmentation, and modality configurations required in neuro‑imaging research and clinical AI applications.
